sentences.en: As he stood on the winner's rostrum, he sang the words of the national anthem.
sentences.cn: 当他站在领奖台上，他唱起了国歌中的词句。

From the rostrum he thundered at them and shook his fists.

sentences.en: He elbowed his way through the crowd towards the rostrum.

sentences.en: He pushed his way through the crowd to the the front of rostrum.

sentences.cn: 学生们把他轰下了讲台.

sentences.en: His eyes ranged over the audience before he mounted the rostrum.
sentences.cn: 在登上讲台之前他用目光向观众扫视了一下.

sentences.en: She quickly got on the rostrum and shouted: " We are free now! "
sentences.cn: 她快速登上讲台,大声喊道: “ 现在我们自由了! ”
